dialogueTree.enemyPhrase: You dare to trespass in our domain, mortal? What foolishness drives you here?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I am Elianor Dawnblade, the Guardian of Light. I come to challenge the darkness that plagues these lands.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Hah! Another self-proclaimed hero, thinking they can stand against the might of Malum. Your fate is sealed, fool.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I have faced darkness before and emerged victorious. Let us settle this without bloodshed.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Pitiful attempt at negotiation. Prepare to face the wrath of the Bone Rattler!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I offer you a chance to stand down and join the side of light. There is still hope for redemption.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Redemption? Such foolish notions. My loyalty lies with Malum, and you shall fall before us!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Very well, if battle is what you seek, then battle you shall have.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: A wise decision, mortal. Face the fury of the undead!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I sense fear in your words. Are you truly committed to this darkness?
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Fear? Ha! The Bone Rattler fears nothing. You will learn the true meaning of terror!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: You speak bravely, but your actions betray your cowardice. Face me in battle or flee in shame.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Insolent wretch! I shall crush you where you stand, then dance upon your bones!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Your threats hold no power over me. I stand firm against the darkness, ready to face whatever comes.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Foolish mortal, your bravery will be your undoing. Prepare for oblivion!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I seek to understand the darkness that consumes this land. Will you share your knowledge with me?
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Knowledge? The likes of you are unworthy of such enlightenment. Prepare to be crushed beneath the Bone Rattler's might.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Violence is not always the answer. Let us find a peaceful resolution to this conflict.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Peaceful resolution? Bah! The only resolution is your demise at my hands!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I offer you a last chance to reconsider. Join me in the fight against Malum, or face the consequences.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Join you? A laughable proposition. I shall relish the moment your light is extinguished.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: It seems words will not sway you. In that case, let our actions speak for us in battle.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: So be it. Prepare for a swift end at the hands of the Bone Rattler!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Your arrogance blinds you. There is strength in unity, even with those you consider foes.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Unity? Strength? Such feeble attempts to sway me. Prepare to face the full force of darkness!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will not waste words on one so blinded by hatred. Let our actions determine the victor.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Ha! A warrior after my own heart. Let the battle commence, and may the victor revel in the spoils.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Your loyalty to Malum is admirable, but misplaced. I offer you a chance to turn the tide and join us.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Admirable? Misplaced? Your words make me sick. Prepare for the Bone Rattler's wrath!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I see that words hold no sway over you. Let us settle this in combat, as warriors should.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Ah, a warrior's spirit. In battle, we shall find out who truly stands as the superior being.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: So be it. Prepare yourself, for I will not hold back in the face of darkness.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Brave words. Let us see if your actions can match your bravado. Prepare for the Bone Rattler's assault!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I relish the challenge. Let our blades clash and our magic spark, for only one will emerge victorious.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: A true warrior's challenge. The Bone Rattler accepts. Let the battle begin!
